clinical_study.brief_title: Surgery Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients With Grade 1 Obesity and Overweight
clinical_study.official_title: Ileal Interposition With Sleeve Gastrectomy for Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Treatment

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluate the Duodenal Ileal Interposition with Sleeve Gastrectomy for Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in grade 1 obesity and overweight patients.

detailed_description.textblock: A clinical trial, 1-arm treatment (Duodenal Ileal Interposition with Sleeve Gastrectomy for Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus), including 50 research subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus and obesity class I or overweight. The main objective is to analyse the effect on glycemic control after 2 years of follow-up.

primary_outcome.measure: Remission of type 2 Diabetes at 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with glycated hemoglobin (HbA1c) of 6.0% or less, without use of diabetes medications

secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with glycated hemoglobin (HbA1c) < 6.5%, but still in use of oral anti diabetic drugs and/or insulin

other_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1, 3, 6, 12, 18 and 24 months after surgery
other_outcome.description: Application of World Health Organization's Quality of Life questionnaire (WHOQOL-BREF)

arm_group.description: Duodenal Ileal Interposition with Sleeve Gastrectomy.

intervention.intervention_name: Duodenal Ileal Interposition with Sleeve Gastrectomy
intervention.description: Laparoscopic or open Duodenal Ileal Interposition with Sleeve Gastrectomy
